fr.dc.clients.services.dao.impl

Class ClientDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dc.clients.services.dao.impl.ClientDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientDAOInterface

    public class ClientDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientDAOInterface
    This is the implementation class for the data access object which implements all the methods in the data access object interface

        public java.util.List<Client> getAll()
        This method is used to get all clients from the database. This method overrides the getAll method in the data access object interface.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        clientList The list containing the clients read from the database

      • getById

        public Client getById(int id)
        This method is used to get a client with matching id from the database. This method overrides the getById method in the data access object interface.
        Specified by:
        getById in interface ClientDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the client to be read from the database
        Returns:
        client The client with the matching id from the database

      • create

        public void create(Client client)
        This method is used to save a client to the database. This method overrides the getAll method in the data access object interface.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ClientDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be saved to the database

      • update

        public void update(Client client)
        This method searches for a client from the database whose id matches the user input and updates it in the database. This method overrides the getAll method in the data access object interface.
        Specified by:
        update in interface ClientDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be updated in the database

      • delete

        public void delete(int id)
        This method deletes a client with the matching id from the database. This method overrides the getAll method in the data access object interface.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface ClientDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the client to be deleted from the database
